title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 89 - AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 89 - AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
State Regulations
§ 89.0 - Purpose
§ 89.1 - Definitions
§ 89.2 - General requirements related to filing and extensions for filing of annual audited financial reports and audit committee appointment
§ 89.3 - Contents of annual audited financial report
§ 89.4 - Designation of CPA
§ 89.5 - Qualifications of CPA
§ 89.6 - Consolidated or combined audits
§ 89.7 - Scope of audit and report of CPA
§ 89.8 - Notification of adverse financial condition
§ 89.9 - Communication of internal control related matters noted in an audit
§ 89.10 - CPA's letter of qualifications
§ 89.11 - Availability and maintenance of CPA work papers
§ 89.12 - Requirements for audit committees
§ 89.13 - Conduct of company in connection with the preparation of required reports and documents
§ 89.14 - Management's report of internal control over financial reporting
§ 89.15 - Canadian and British insurer
§ 89.16 - Internal audit function requirements
§ 89.17 - Effective date and special rules

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 89

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 307[b], 1109, 4710[a][2], 5904[b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
